sell_limit_currency_var_0 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = sell_limit_currency_var_1
		value = 0
	}
}
money_value_target_time_reset = {
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_target_time
		value = 0
	}
}

stockpiling_capital_state_transfert = {
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_capital
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = no
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_no_capital
		}
	}

	if  = {
		limit  = {
			exists = scope:central_bank_site_no_capital
		}

		#actual Capital
		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {

			#gold
			change_variable = {
				name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					}
				}
			}

			#Financial product
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_manufacture_stock_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_manufacture_stock_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_agricultural_stock_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_agricultural_stock_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}

			#Goods
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_grain_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_wood_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_coal_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_iron_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lead_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_lead_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_oil_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dye_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_dye_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_silk_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_silk_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rubber_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_rubber_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ammunition_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_ammunition_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_small_arms_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_small_arms_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_artillery_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_artillery_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_tanks_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_tanks_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_aeroplanes_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_aeroplanes_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_manowars_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_manowars_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ironclads_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_ironclads_state_1
					}
				}
			}

		}

		#old capital
		scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
			if  = {
				limit  = {
					exists = scope:central_bank_site_no_capital
				}

				#gold
				set_variable = {
					name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
					value = 0
				}

				#financial product
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_manufacture_stock_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}

				#goods
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lead_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dye_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_silk_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rubber_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ammunition_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_small_arms_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_artillery_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_tanks_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_aeroplanes_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_manowars_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ironclads_state_1
					value = 0
				}

				#Currency
				#begin_tag_2
				#dinar
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#dinar_algerian_dinar
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#dinar_iraqi_dinar
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#dinar_libyan_dinar
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#dinar_moroccan_dirham
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
					value = 0
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#dinar_qiran
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#dinar_saudi_riyal
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1

				set_variable = {

					value = 0

					name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#spe_latvian_lats
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#spe_lithuanian_litas
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#spe_peseta
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#spe_ruble
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#spe_uni
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#spe_yen
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#spe_yuan
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#spe_zloti
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#thaler_prussian_thaler
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#thaler_saxon_thaler
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
					value = 0
				} #end_tag_2

				remove_modifier = central_bank_place
				remove_modifier = central_bank_historic_place

				remove_modifier = financial_center_place
				remove_modifier =	financial_center_place_spe
				remove_modifier = financial_center_historic_place

				remove_modifier = national_stockpile_place
				remove_modifier = national_stockpile_historic_place

				add_modifier = {
					name = central_bank_place
					months = 1
				}
				add_modifier = {
					name = central_bank_historic_place
					months = 1
				}

				add_modifier = {
					name = financial_center_place
					months = 1
				}
				add_modifier = {
					name = financial_center_place_spe
					months = 1
				}
				add_modifier = {
					name = financial_center_historic_place
					months = 1
				}

				add_modifier = {
					name = national_stockpile_place
					months = 1
				}
				add_modifier = {
					name = national_stockpile_historic_place
					months = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
reference_currency_in_gold_fixe = {
	set_variable = {
		name = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country_equivalent_gold_fixe
		value = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country_equivalent_gold
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country_fixe
		value = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country_in_gold_fixe
		value = reference_currency_owned_by_the_country_in_gold
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_exchange_rate_with_reference_currency_fixe
		value = money_value_exchange_rate_with_reference_currency
	}

	#update
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_effective
		value = {
			add = global_monetary_reference
			multiply = var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2
		}
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_1
		value = var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_target_1
		value = var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_effective
	}
	set_variable = {
		name = amount_reference_currency_to_ensure_parity_fixe #quantité de valeur de référence nécessaire pour assurer la parité
		value = amount_reference_currency_to_ensure_parity
	}
}
median_currency_value = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_median
		value = weighted_average_currency_value
	}
}

money_value_target_modification = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			root.devaluation_score > root.revaluation_score_2
			not = {
				money_value < 0.01
			}
		}
		devaluation_money_value_target = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			root.revaluation_score > root.devaluation_score_2
			central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent > 0.75
			# not = {
			# 	money_value < 0.01
			# }
		}
		revaluation_money_value_target = yes
	}
	#fixe 0.01
	if = {
		limit = {
			money_value < 0.009
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_1
			value = 0.01
		}
	}
}

devaluation_money_value_target = {
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_target_1
		value = devaluation_money_value_target
	}
}

revaluation_money_value_target = {
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_target_1
		value = revaluation_money_value_target
	}
}

###########################

money_creation_in_foreign_exchange_reserve = {
	if = { #si  la devise ne dopit pas etre revalué et que la couverture en or est supperieur à 75% alors il y a impression de devise
		limit = {
			not = {
				root.revaluation_score > root.devaluation_score_2
			}
			central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent > 0.75
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_complete
			value = {
				value = 0
				add = money_value_target
				subtract = money_supply
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency

}
money_destruction_in_foreign_exchange_reserve = {
    set_variable = {
        name = money_value_target_complete_destruction
        value = {
            value = 0
            add = money_value_target
            subtract = money_supply
        }
    }

	if = {
		limit = {
			money_supply > var:money_value_target_complete_destruction
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete_destruction
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete_destruction
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete_destruction
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete_destruction
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1

			}

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete_destruction
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					}

# ███████╗██╗     ██╗   ██╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗        ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗
# ██╔════╝██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝        ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝
# █████╗  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║███████╗        ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗
# ██╔══╝  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║╚════██║        ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝    ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝
# ██║     ███████╗╚██████╔╝╚██████╗   ██║   ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████║███████╗██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║███████╗╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗
# ╚═╝     ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝   ╚═╝    ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

fluctuations_money_value_1_month = {
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1M
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1M = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_month_1
            value = money_value
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1M = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_month_2
            value = money_value
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01
            add = var:money_value_var_month_2
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01
            divide = var:money_value_var_month_1
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1M
            value = 0
        }
    }
}
fluctuations_money_value_1_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_half_1_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_1_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_1
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_1
            add = var:money_value_var_1_year
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_1
            divide = var:money_value_var_half_1_year
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y
            value = 0
        }
    }
}
fluctuations_money_value_5_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_half_5_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_var_5_year
            value = money_value_rapported_inflation
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_5
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_5
            add = var:money_value_var_5_year
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_5
            divide = var:money_value_var_half_5_year
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y
            value = 0
        }
    }
}

		name = money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y

            value = money_value_rapported_inflation

            name = money_value_dif_10
            value = 0
        }

            name = money_value_dif_10

# ███████╗██╗     ██╗   ██╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗         ██████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗
# ██╔════╝██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝        ██╔════╝ ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗
# █████╗  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║███████╗        ██║  ███╗██║  ██║██████╔╝
# ██╔══╝  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║╚════██║        ██║   ██║██║  ██║██╔═══╝
# ██║     ███████╗╚██████╔╝╚██████╗   ██║   ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████║███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║
# ╚═╝     ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝   ╚═╝    ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝

fluctuations_gdp_1_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = gdp_fixe_var_1_1Y
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:gdp_fixe_var_1_1Y = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = GDP_var_half_1_year
            value = gdp
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:gdp_fixe_var_1_1Y = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = GDP_var_1_year
            value = gdp
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = GDP_dif_1
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = GDP_dif_1
            add = var:GDP_var_1_year
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = GDP_dif_1
            divide = var:GDP_var_half_1_year
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = gdp_fixe_var_1_1Y
            value = 0
        }
    }
}
fluctuations_gdp_5_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = gdp_fixe_var_1_5Y
		add = 1
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:gdp_fixe_var_1_5Y = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = GDP_var_half_5_year
            value = gdp
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:gdp_fixe_var_1_5Y = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = GDP_var_5_year
            value = gdp
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = GDP_dif_5
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = GDP_dif_5
            add = var:GDP_var_5_year
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = GDP_dif_5
            divide = var:GDP_var_half_5_year
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = gdp_fixe_var_1_5Y
            value = 0
        }
    }
}

		name = gdp_fixe_var_1_10Y

        limit = {

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:gdp_fixe_var_1_10Y = 10
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = GDP_var_10_year
            value = gdp
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = GDP_dif_10

        }

            name = GDP_dif_10

        }

            divide = var:GDP_var_half_10_year

# ██╗███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗      █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
# ██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║     ██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
# ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║     ███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
# ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ██║██║ ╚████║██║     ███████╗██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝

#cumulative_inflation
# cumulative_inflation_1_year = {
# 	change_variable = {
# 		name = cumulative_inflation_1_year_counter
# 		add = 1
# 	}
	
# 	#_1
# 	if = {
# 		limit = {
# 			var:cumulative_inflation_1_year_counter = 1
# 		}
# 		set_variable = {
# 			name = cumulative_inflation_1_year_1
# 			value = inflation_value
# 		}
# 	}
# 	#_2
# 	if = {
# 		limit = {
# 			var:cumulative_inflation_1_year_counter = 2
# 		}
# 		set_variable = {
# 			name = cumulative_inflation_1_year_2
# 			value = inflation_value
# 		}
# 	}

#     if = {
#         limit = {
#             var:cumulative_inflation_1_year_counter >= 2
#         }		
#         set_variable = {
#             name = cumulative_inflation_1_year_counter
#             value = 0
#         }
# 	}
# }
cumulative_inflation_5_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter
		add = 1
	}

	#_1
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_1
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_2
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_2
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_3
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 3
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_3
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_4
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 4
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_4
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_5
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_5
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter >= 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter
            value = 0
        }
	}
}
cumulative_inflation_10_year = {
	change_variable = {
		name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter
		add = 1
	}

	#_1
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_1
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_2
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_2
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_3
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 3
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_3
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_4
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 4
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_4
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_5
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_5
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_6
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 6
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_6
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_7
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 7
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_7
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_8
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 8
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_8
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_9
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 9
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_9
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}
	#_10
	if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 10
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_10
            value = inflation_value
        }
	}

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter >= 10
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter
            value = 0
        }
	}
}
cumulative_inflation_since_beginning = {
    change_variable = {
		name = cumulative_inflation_since_beginning
		add = inflation_value
	}
}

#inflation_on_consumer_goods
inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations = {
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
		add = 1
	}

	#inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
            value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
            value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
            add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
            subtract = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
            divide = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
		inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_02
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 3
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
            value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 4
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
            value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_02
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_02
            add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_02
            subtract = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_02
            divide = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
        }
		inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_03
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
            value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 6
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
            value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_03
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_03
            add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_03
            subtract = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_03
            divide = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
        }
		inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_04
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 7
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
			value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 8
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_8
			value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_04
			value = 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_04
			add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_8
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_04
			subtract = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_04
			divide = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
		}
		inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
	}
	
	#inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_05
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 9
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
			value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 10
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_10
			value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_05
			value = 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_05
			add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_10
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_05
			subtract = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_05
			divide = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
		}
		inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
	}

	#inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_06
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 11
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
			value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_12
			value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_06
			value = 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_06
			add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_12
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_06
			subtract = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_06
			divide = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
		}
		inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
		reset_inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = yes
	}
	
}
inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = {
	set_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		value = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_02
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_03
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_04
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_05
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_06
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		divide = 6
	}
}
reset_inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#inflation_on_energy
inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations = {
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
		add = 1
	}

	#inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_01
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
            value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
            value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_01
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_01
            add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_01
            subtract = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_01
            divide = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
		inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_02
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 3
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
            value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 4
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
            value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_02
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_02
            add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_02
            subtract = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_02
            divide = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
        }
		inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_03
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
            value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 6
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
            value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_03
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_03
            add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_03
            subtract = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_03
            divide = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
        }
		inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_04
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 7
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
			value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 8
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_8
			value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_04
			value = 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_04
			add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_8
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_04
			subtract = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_04
			divide = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
		}
		inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
	}
	
	#inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_05
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 9
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
			value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 10
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_10
			value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_05
			value = 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_05
			add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_10
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_05
			subtract = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_05
			divide = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
		}
		inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
	}

	#inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_06
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 11
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
			value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_12
			value = inflation_on_energy_market_value_abs
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_06
			value = 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_06
			add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_12
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_06
			subtract = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_06
			divide = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
		}
		inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
		reset_inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = yes
	}
}
inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = {
	set_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months
		value = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_01
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_02
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_03
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_04
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_05
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_dif_06
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_energy_rolling_inflation_6_months
		divide = 6
	}
}
reset_inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_energy_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#inflation_on_raw_material
inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations = {
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
		add = 1
	}

	#inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_dif_01
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
            value = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
            value = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_abs
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_dif_01
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_dif_01
            add = var:inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_dif_01
            subtract = var:inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_dif_01
            divide = var:inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
		inflation_on_raw_material_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_dif_02
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_raw_material_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 3
        }
        set_variable = {

	}
}
inflation_on_manufactured_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = {
	set_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_manufactured_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		value = var:inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_dif_01
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_manufactured_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_dif_02
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_manufactured_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_dif_03
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_manufactured_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_dif_04
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_manufactured_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_dif_05
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_manufactured_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_dif_06
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_manufactured_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months
		divide = 6
	}
}
reset_inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_manufactured_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#inflation_on_military_equipment
inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations = {
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
		add = 1
	}

	#inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_01
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
            value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
            value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_01
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_01
            add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_01
            subtract = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_01
            divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
		inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_02
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 3
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
            value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 4
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
            value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_02
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_02
            add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_02
            subtract = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_02
            divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
        }
		inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_03
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
            value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 6
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
            value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_03
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_03
            add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_03
            subtract = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_03
            divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
        }
		inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
    }

	#inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 7
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
			value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 8
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_8
			value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
			value = 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
			add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_8
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
			subtract = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
			divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
		}
		inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
	}
	
	#inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05

		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
			value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {

			var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 10
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_10
			value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
		}

			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05

			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05

		}
		change_variable = {

			divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
		}

	}

	#inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 11
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
			value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_12
			value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
			value = 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
			add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_12
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
			subtract = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
			divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
		}
		inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
		reset_inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = yes
	}
}

		name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months

	}

		name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months

	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months

	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months

	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months

	}
	change_variable = {
		name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months

#money_value_dif_01 #6m
money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations = {
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
		add = 1
	}
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 1
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
            value = money_value
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 2
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
            value = money_value
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
            add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
            subtract = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
            divide = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
        }
        # change_variable = {
        #     name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
		# 	multiply = -1
        # }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 3
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
            value = money_value
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 4
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
            value = money_value
        }

        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
            add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
            subtract = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
            divide = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
        }
        # change_variable = {
        #     name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
		# 	multiply = -1
        # }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 5
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
            value = money_value
        }
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 6
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
            value = money_value
        }


        set_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
            value = 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
            add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
            subtract = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
            divide = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
        }
        # change_variable = {
        #     name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
		# 	multiply = -1
        # }
    }

	money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
	reset_money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = yes
}
money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = {
	set_variable = {
		name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
		value = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
		add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
		divide = 3
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
		multiply = -1
	}
}
reset_money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 8
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#monetary_policy_inflation
monetary_policy_inflation = {
    if = {
        limit = {
			not = {
				has_variable = monetary_policy_inflation
			}
        }
		set_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			value = 0
		}
    }

	#law_revaluation
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_25
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			subtract = 1
		}
    }
	if = {
        limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_50
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			subtract = 2
		}
    }
	if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_75
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			subtract = 3
		}
    }
	if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_100
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			subtract = 4
		}
    }

	#law_devaluation
    if = {
        limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
			not = {
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
			}
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			add = 1
		}
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
			not = {
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
			}
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			add = 2
		}
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75
			not = {
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
			}
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			add = 3
		}
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_100
			not = {
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			add = 4
		}
	}

	################################################################################################

    if = {
        limit = {
			var:devaluation_on = 1
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			add = var:inflation_value_predicted_devaluation_month_valided
		}
	}
	if = {
        limit = {
			var:revaluation_on = 1
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			add = var:inflation_value_predicted_revaluation_month_valided
		}
	}
}

monetary_policy_inflation_reset = {
    if = {
        limit = {
			var:monetary_policy_inflation < 0
			var:revaluation_on = 0
			var:revaluation_on = 0
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			add = 1
		}
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
			var:monetary_policy_inflation > 0
			var:revaluation_on = 0
			var:revaluation_on = 0
        }
		change_variable = {
			name = monetary_policy_inflation
			subtract = 1
		}
    }
} 

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

# ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║     ███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║    ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ██║██║█████╗  ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝
# ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║    ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ██║██║██╔══╝  ██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗
# ██║██║ ╚████║██║     ███████╗██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║    ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██████╔╝██║██║     ██║███████╗██║  ██║
# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝    ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

currency_strength_modifier = {

	#reference_currency
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = reference_currency
		}
		remove_modifier = reference_currency
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = has_central_bank
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			money_value > global_var:money_value_median
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = reference_currency
			multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = reference_currency_no
		}
		remove_modifier = reference_currency_no
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = has_central_bank
            has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			money_value < global_var:money_value_median
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = reference_currency_no
		}
	}
	#strong_currency
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = strong_currency
		}
		remove_modifier = strong_currency
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			money_value > global_var:money_value_median
			has_modifier = has_central_bank
			not = {
                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            }
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = strong_currency
			multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
		}
	}
	#weak_currency
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = weak_currency
		}
		remove_modifier = weak_currency
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			money_value < global_var:money_value_median
			has_modifier = has_central_bank
			money_value > 0.01
			not = {
                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            }
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = weak_currency
			multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
		}

	}
	#extreme_weak_currency
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
		}
		remove_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = has_central_bank
			money_value <= 0.01
			not = {
                has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
            }
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = extreme_weak_currency
			multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
		}

	}
}
inflation_modifier = {
	# remove_modifier = deflation_country
	# remove_modifier = inflation_country


	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = inflation_country
		}
		remove_modifier = inflation_country
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = deflation_country
		}
		remove_modifier = deflation_country
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
			not = {
				or = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
		}
		remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
 			#has_law = law_type:law_revaluation
		 	inflation_value > 0.02
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = inflation_country
			multiplier = inflation_value_for_modifier
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			#has_law = law_type:law_devaluation
			inflation_value < -0.02
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = deflation_country
			multiplier = inflation_value_for_modifier
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
 			inflation_value > 0.5
			not = {
				or = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
 			inflation_value < -0.5
			not = {
				or = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗████████╗ █████╗ ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗    ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗     ██████╗     ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗████████╗██╗  ██╗
# ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██╔══██╗██╔═══██╗██║     ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██╔════╝     ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║╚══██╔══╝██║  ██║
# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗     ██║   ███████║██████╔╝ ╚████╔╝     ██████╔╝██║   ██║██║     ██║██║      ╚████╔╝     ███████╗     ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║   ██║   ███████║
# ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝     ██║   ██╔══██║██╔══██╗  ╚██╔╝      ██╔═══╝ ██║   ██║██║     ██║██║       ╚██╔╝      ██╔═══██╗    ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║   ██║   ██╔══██║
# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║   ██║       ██║     ╚██████╔╝███████╗██║╚██████╗   ██║       ╚██████╔╝    ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║   ██║   ██║  ██║
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝      ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝        ╚═════╝     ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝
