ai_currency_deflation_inflation = {
    if = {
        limit = {
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < 0.1
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > -0.1

        }
        ai_no_currency_deflation_inflation = yes
    }
   #deflation_croi
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.1
        }
        ai_currency_deflation_25 = yes
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.25
        }
        ai_currency_deflation_50 = yes
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.50
        }
        ai_currency_deflation_75 = yes
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.75
        }
        ai_currency_deflation_100 = yes
    }

    #deflation_decroi
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio <= 0.1
        }
        ai_no_currency_deflation_inflation = yes
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio <= 0.25
        }
        ai_currency_deflation_25 = yes
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio <= 0.50
        }
        ai_currency_deflation_50 = yes
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_100
            currency_market_goods_lake_ratio <= 0.75
        }
        ai_currency_deflation_75 = yes
    }



    # #inflation
    # if = {
    #     limit = {
    #         has_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
    #         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.1
    #         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio >= -0.25
    #     }
    #     ai_currency_inflation_25 = yes
    # }
    # if = {
    #     limit = {
    #         has_law = law_type:revaluation_currency_25
    #         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.25
    #         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio >= -0.50
    #     }
    #     ai_currency_inflation_50 = yes
    # }
    # if = {
    #     limit = {
    #         has_law = law_type:revaluation_currency_50
    #         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.50
    #         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio >= -0.75
    #     }
    #     ai_currency_inflation_75 = yes
    # }
    # if = {
    #     limit = {
    #         has_law = law_type:revaluation_currency_75
    #         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.75
    #     }
    #     ai_currency_inflation_100 = yes
    # }
}
ai_no_currency_deflation_inflation = {
    activate_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
    random_scope_building = {
        limit = {
            is_building_group = bg_bank
        }
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
    }
}

ai_currency_deflation_25 = {
    activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
    random_scope_building = {
        limit = {
            is_building_group = bg_bank
            not = {
                has_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
            }
        }
        add_modifier = {
            name = devaluation_currency_25
        }
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
    }
}
ai_currency_deflation_50 = {
    activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
    random_scope_building = {
        limit = {
            is_building_group = bg_bank
            not = {
                has_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
            }
        }
        add_modifier = {
            name = devaluation_currency_50
        }
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
    }

}
ai_currency_deflation_75 = {
    activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75
    random_scope_building = {
        limit = {
            is_building_group = bg_bank
            not = {
                has_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
            }
        }
        add_modifier = {
            name = devaluation_currency_75
        }
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
    }

}
ai_currency_deflation_100 = {
    activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_100
    random_scope_building = {
        limit = {
            is_building_group = bg_bank
            not = {
                has_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
            }
        }
        add_modifier = {
            name = devaluation_currency_100
            # multiply = 10
            # months = 6
        }
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
        remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
    }
}

# ██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗    ██╗██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║   ██╔╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
# ██║  ██║█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║  ██╔╝ ██████╔╝█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
# ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║ ██╔╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ██████╔╝███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██╔╝   ██║  ██║███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
# ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝    ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝

############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################

devaluation_on = {
    change_variable = {
        name = devaluation_on_time
        add = 1
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:devaluation_on_time = devaluation_time_month
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = devaluation_on
            value = 0
        }
        set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_1
			value = var:money_value_target_valided
		}



        ############# Reset
        set_variable = {
			name = devaluation_on_time
			value = 0
		}
    }
}
revaluation_on = {
    change_variable = {
        name = revaluation_on_time
        add = 1
    }

    if = {
        limit = {
            var:revaluation_on_time = revaluation_time_month
        }
        set_variable = {
            name = revaluation_on
            value = 0
        }
        set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_1
			value = var:money_value_target_valided
		}


        ############# Reset
        set_variable = {
			name = revaluation_on_time
			value = 0
		}
    }
}

############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################

#  ██████╗███████╗███╗   ██╗████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗██╗  ██╗     ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██████╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝████╗  ██║╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██║ ██╔╝    ██╔════╝ ██╔═══██╗██║     ██╔══██╗
# ██║     █████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║   ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██║         ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╔╝     ██║  ███╗██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║
# ██║     ██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║   ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║         ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔═██╗     ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║
# ╚██████╗███████╗██║ ╚████║   ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗    ██████╔╝██║  ██║██║ ╚████║██║  ██╗    ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝
#  ╚═════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝    ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝  ╚═╝     ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝
#

# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝
# ██████╔╝█████╗  ███████╗█████╗  ██████╔╝██║   ██║█████╗  ███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ╚════██║
# ██║  ██║███████╗███████║███████╗██║  ██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗███████║

country_gold_reserve_unlimited = {
    if = {
        limit = {
            has_modifier = country_gold_reserve_unlimited
        }
        remove_modifier = country_gold_reserve_unlimited
    }
    add_modifier = {
        name = country_gold_reserve_unlimited
    }
}

stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_1 = {
    set_variable = {
        name = stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
        value = 0
    }
    if = {
        limit = {
            central_bank_gold_reserves_market_goods_sell_orders > 0
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
            add = central_bank_gold_reserves_market_goods_sell_orders
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
            multiply = 1000 #multiplicateur d'or entrant
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
            multiply = 4
        }
    }
}

stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_state = {
    every_scope_state = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
                #is_homeland_of_country_cultures = ROOT
            }
            save_scope_as = central_bank_site
            scope:central_bank_site = {
                change_variable = {
                    name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
                    add = root.var:stockpiling_central_bank_gold_reserves_var_2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

trade_balance = {
	change_variable = {
		name =  export_value_in_gold
		add  = {
			value = export_value_in_gold_week
			multiply = 6
		}
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = import_value_in_currency
		add  = {
			value = import_value_in_currency_week
			multiply = 6
		}
	}

	#autre
	set_variable = {
		name = trade_balance_in_gold_fixe #c'est une valeur fixe pour calculer le central_bank_reserves sans créer de boucle de calcule qui crer des crash
		value = trade_balance_in_gold
	}
}

# ███████╗████████╗ ██████╗  ██████╗██╗  ██╗██████╗ ██╗██╗     ██╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗      ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔═══██╗██╔════╝██║ ██╔╝██╔══██╗██║██║     ██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝     ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ███████╗   ██║   ██║   ██║██║     █████╔╝ ██████╔╝██║██║     ██║██╔██╗ ██║██║  ███╗    ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ╚════██║   ██║   ██║   ██║██║     ██╔═██╗ ██╔═══╝ ██║██║     ██║██║╚██╗██║██║   ██║    ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ███████║   ██║   ╚██████╔╝╚██████╗██║  ██╗██║     ██║███████╗██║██║ ╚████║╚██████╔╝    ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║

#begin_tag_1
#dinar
stockpiling_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_algerian_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_iraqi_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_libyan_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_moroccan_dirham
stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			add = dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			add = dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_omanian_rial
stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			add = dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_omanian_rial
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			add = dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_qiran
stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_qiran > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			add = dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_qiran > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_qiran
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_qiran_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2

		}

			add = var:circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_serbian_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_serbian_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_tunisian_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_yugoslav_dinar
stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			add = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				}
				export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = yes

		name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
		value = 0

			dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0

			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {

							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#dollar_australian_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dollar_australian_dollar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_dollar_australian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dollar_australian_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_canadian_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_caribbean_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_confederate_states_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_liberian_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_new_zealand_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
