			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			add = dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
				}
				export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}

		}
	}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_ariary_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_eco_ariary > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			add = eco_ariary_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
				}
				export_in_eco_ariary > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				add = export_in_eco_ariary
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_eco_ariary_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_ariary_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2

		}

			add = var:circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_state_1 = yes

				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency

		}

			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}

			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#eco_east_african_eco
stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_eco_east_african_eco > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
				}
				export_in_eco_east_african_eco > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = export_in_eco_east_african_eco
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			add = eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
				}
				export_in_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = export_in_eco_ethiopian_birr
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			add = eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			add = eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
				}
				export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				add = export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			add = eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#eco_nigerian_naira
stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_eco_nigerian_naira > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			add = eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
				}
				export_in_eco_nigerian_naira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_eco_nigerian_naira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2

			}
		}

		value = 0

		limit = {
			eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#eco_south_african_rand
stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat

		name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		value = 0

		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_eco_south_african_rand > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			add = eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta

			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2

			}

				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				add = export_in_eco_south_african_rand
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			add = eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#eco_tuareg_ouguiya
stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			add = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				}
				export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			add = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_eco_west_african_eco > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			add = eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				}
				export_in_eco_west_african_eco > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = export_in_eco_west_african_eco
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_1 = yes
}

		name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2

stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#franc_belgian_franc
stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_franc_belgian_franc > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				}
				export_in_franc_belgian_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = export_in_franc_belgian_franc
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_1 = yes

		name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0

		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0

		limit = {
			or = {
				franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0

				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2

		name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2

		limit = {
			franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0

			name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2

		}
	}
	stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#franc_luxembourgish_franc
stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				}
				export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				add = export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#franc_swiss_franc
stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_franc_swiss_franc > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			add = franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				}
				export_in_franc_swiss_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = export_in_franc_swiss_franc
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2

		}

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_state_1 = yes

			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {

								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1

					}

#gulden
stockpiling_gulden_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_gulden > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				}
				export_in_gulden > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = export_in_gulden
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_gulden_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_gulden_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#gulden_bavarian_gulden
stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				}
				export_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				add = export_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_1 = yes
}

		name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2

stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#gulden_florin
stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_florin_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_gulden_florin > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			add = gulden_florin_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				}
				export_in_gulden_florin > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				add = export_in_gulden_florin
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_gulden_florin_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_gulden_florin_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			add = gulden_florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#gulden_hungarian_forint
stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			add = gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
				}
				export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			add = gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_gulden_indies_guilder > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
			add = gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_delta
		}

			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
			multiply = 4

				not  = {

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				add = export_in_gulden_indies_guilder
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_1 = yes
}

		name = circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			add = gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
				}
				export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				add = export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_1 = yes
}

		value = 0
	}

			gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0

	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2

			or = {
				krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_delta > 0

				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2

				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency

				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
