		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			add = krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#krone_danish_krone
stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_krone_danish_krone > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			add = krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
				}
				export_in_krone_danish_krone > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				add = export_in_krone_danish_krone
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			add = krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#krone_estonian_kroon
stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_krone_estonian_kroon > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
			add = krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
				}
				export_in_krone_estonian_kroon > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
				add = export_in_krone_estonian_kroon
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
			add = krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#krone_icelandic_krona
stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				krone_icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_krone_icelandic_krona > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
			add = krone_icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
				}
				export_in_krone_icelandic_krona > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				add = export_in_krone_icelandic_krona
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			krone_icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2

			add = var:circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

		name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
		value = 0

		limit = {
			or = {
				krone_norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_krone_norwegian_krone > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2

			krone_norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0

			name = circulating_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2

stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#krone_slovak_koruna
stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_krone_slovak_koruna > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			add = krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
				}
				export_in_krone_slovak_koruna > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				add = export_in_krone_slovak_koruna
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			add = krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#krone_swedish_krona
stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_krone_swedish_krona > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			add = krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
				}
				export_in_krone_swedish_krona > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				add = export_in_krone_swedish_krona
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			add = krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#leon_leu
stockpiling_leon_leu_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_leon_leu_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				leon_leu_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_leon_leu > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
			add = leon_leu_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
				}
				export_in_leon_leu > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
				add = export_in_leon_leu
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_leon_leu_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_leon_leu_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			leon_leu_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
			add = leon_leu_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_leon_leu_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_leon_leu_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_leon_leu_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#leon_lev
stockpiling_leon_lev_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_leon_lev_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				leon_lev_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_leon_lev > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
			add = leon_lev_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
				}
				export_in_leon_lev > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
				add = export_in_leon_lev
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_leon_lev_c_1 = yes

		name = circulating_leon_lev_c_var_2
		value = 0

			leon_lev_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0

		}
	}

stockpiling_leon_lev_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lira
stockpiling_lira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_lira > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
				}
				export_in_lira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_lira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_lira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_lira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lira_ducato
stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_ducato_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_lira_ducato > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
			add = lira_ducato_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
				}
				export_in_lira_ducato > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
				add = export_in_lira_ducato
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_lira_ducato_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_lira_ducato_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			lira_ducato_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
			add = lira_ducato_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lira_ottoman_lira
stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_lira_ottoman_lira > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
				}
				export_in_lira_ottoman_lira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_lira_ottoman_lira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lira_scudo_pontificio
stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_lira_scudo_pontificio > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			add = lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
				}
				export_in_lira_scudo_pontificio > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				add = export_in_lira_scudo_pontificio
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			add = lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2

		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_lira_scudo_sardo > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			add = lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}

			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency

				export_in_lira_scudo_sardo > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				add = export_in_lira_scudo_sardo
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2

			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			add = lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders

			add = var:circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#lira_toscane_lira
stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_lira_toscane_lira > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
				}
				export_in_lira_toscane_lira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_lira_toscane_lira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			add = lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#mark
stockpiling_mark_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_mark_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				mark_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_mark > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			add = mark_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				}
				export_in_mark > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = export_in_mark
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_mark_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_mark_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
			add = mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_mark_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_mark_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_mark_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#mark_finnish_markka
stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_mark_finnish_markka > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			add = mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				}
				export_in_mark_finnish_markka > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = export_in_mark_finnish_markka
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			add = mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso
stockpiling_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_argentine_peso
stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_argentine_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_argentine_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_argentine_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_bolivien_peso
stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_bolivien_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_bolivien_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_bolivien_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_chilean_peso
stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_chilean_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_chilean_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_chilean_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		value = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0

		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_colombian_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2

				not  = {

			}
			change_variable = {

			}
			change_variable = {

			}

		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}

		name = circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}

stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root

					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes

							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}

						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place

								name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
