							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_cuban_peso
stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_cuban_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_cuban_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_cuban_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_ecuadorian_peso
stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1

	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_el_salvador_colon_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_el_salvador_colon > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
			add = peso_el_salvador_colon_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_el_salvador_colon > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_el_salvador_colon
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_1 = yes
}

		name = circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			peso_el_salvador_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}

			name = circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2

stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_guatemalan_quetzal
stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
			add = peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2

			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_1 = yes

		value = 0

			peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}

stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_honduran_lempira
stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_honduran_lempira > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			add = peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_honduran_lempira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_honduran_lempira
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			add = peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_mexican_peso
stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_mexican_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_mexican_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_mexican_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			add = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			add = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_paraguayan_peso
stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_paraguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_paraguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_paraguayan_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_paraguayan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2

		}

stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_philippine_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_philippine_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_philippine_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation

				var:devaluation_on = 1

			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2

			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_1 = yes

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#peso_sol_de_oro
stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_sol_de_oro > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			add = peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_sol_de_oro > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_sol_de_oro
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			add = peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_peso_uruguayan_peso > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
				}
				export_in_peso_uruguayan_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = export_in_peso_uruguayan_peso
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
			add = peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2

				peso_venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0

						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes

							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}

								name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}

		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#pound_irish_pound
stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_pound_irish_pound > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			add = pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
				}
				export_in_pound_irish_pound > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				add = export_in_pound_irish_pound
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			add = pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#pound_sterling
stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				pound_sterling_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_pound_sterling > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			add = pound_sterling_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				}
				export_in_pound_sterling > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				add = export_in_pound_sterling
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_pound_sterling_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_pound_sterling_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			pound_sterling_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			add = pound_sterling_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_pound_sterling_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#real
stockpiling_real_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_real_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				real_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_real > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
			add = real_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				}
				export_in_real > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				add = export_in_real
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_real_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_real_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			real_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_2
			add = real_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_real_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_real_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_real_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_real_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#real_brazilian_real
stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				real_brazilian_real_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_real_brazilian_real > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			add = real_brazilian_real_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
				}
				export_in_real_brazilian_real > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				add = export_in_real_brazilian_real
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_1 = yes
}

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}

		limit = {
			real_brazilian_real_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}

		}

			name = circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_real_brazilian_real_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2

			}
			change_variable = {

			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation

				var:devaluation_on = 1

	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			rupee_indian_rupee_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_2
			add = rupee_indian_rupee_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}

		}

			name = circulating_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1

		}
	}
	stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#rupee_indonesian_rupiah
stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			add = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
				}
				export_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				add = export_in_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			add = rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#spe_baht
stockpiling_spe_baht_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_baht_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_baht_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_spe_baht > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
			add = spe_baht_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
				}
				export_in_spe_baht > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
				add = export_in_spe_baht
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_spe_baht_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_spe_baht_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_spe_baht_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			spe_baht_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_baht_c_var_2
			add = spe_baht_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_baht_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_baht_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_spe_baht_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_baht_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_spe_baht_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

stockpiling_spe_dong_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_dong_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_dong_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_spe_dong > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
			add = spe_dong_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
				}
				export_in_spe_dong > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
				add = export_in_spe_dong
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_2
		}
	}
	circulating_spe_dong_c_1 = yes
}
circulating_spe_dong_c_1 = {
	set_variable = {
		name = circulating_spe_dong_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			spe_dong_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_dong_c_var_2
			add = spe_dong_c_market_goods_buy_orders
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_dong_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = circulating_spe_dong_c_var_1
			add = var:circulating_spe_dong_c_var_2
		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_dong_c_state_1 = yes
}
stockpiling_spe_dong_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#spe_drachma
stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_1 = {
	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
		value = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state
	}
	#######################################################################

	set_variable = {
		name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
		value = 0
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				spe_drachma_c_market_goods_delta > 0
				export_in_spe_drachma > 0
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
			add = spe_drachma_c_market_goods_delta
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
		if = { #accumulation currency
			limit = {
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
				}
				export_in_spe_drachma > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
				add = export_in_spe_drachma
			}
		}
		if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
			}
		}
		if = {#politique monétaire réévaluation
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
				add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_2
		}

		name = circulating_spe_drachma_c_var_2

		}

		}
	}
	stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_state_1 = yes

stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_state_1 = {
	if = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
				or = {
					money_supply < money_value_target
					is_in_devaluation = yes
				}
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					or = {
						is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
						is_in_revaluation = yes
						if = {
							limit = {
								is_in_devaluation = no
							}
							money_supply > money_value_target
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { #pour accumuler de la devise étrangère par les trade routes
			limit = {
				market.owner = root
				not  = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
					scope:central_bank_site = {
						if = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
								value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_var_1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
		value = 0

				spe_korean_won_c_market_goods_delta > 0

				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
		}

			name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2

			name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_var_2
			multiply = 4
		}
