					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state > var:dinar_omanian_rial_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_omanian_rial_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_qiran
buy_dinar_qiran_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_qiran_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
							stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_qiran_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_qiran_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_qiran_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_qiran_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state > var:dinar_qiran_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_qiran_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_qiran_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_saudi_riyal
buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_saudi_riyal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
							stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_saudi_riyal_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state > var:dinar_saudi_riyal_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_serbian_dinar
buy_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_serbian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state
							stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_serbian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state > var:dinar_serbian_dinar_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_tunisian_dinar
buy_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
							stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state > var:dinar_tunisian_dinar_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dinar_yugoslav_dinar
buy_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state
							stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state > var:dinar_yugoslav_dinar_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_australian_dollar
buy_dollar_australian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_australian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_australian_dollar_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_australian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_australian_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state
							stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_australian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_australian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_australian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_australian_dollar_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_australian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_australian_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state > var:dollar_australian_dollar_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_australian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_canadian_dollar
buy_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_canadian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_canadian_dollar_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_canadian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_canadian_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state
							stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_canadian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_canadian_dollar_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_canadian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_canadian_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state > var:dollar_canadian_dollar_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_caribbean_dollar
buy_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state
							stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0

					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state > var:dollar_caribbean_dollar_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_confederate_states_dollar
buy_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state
							stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state > var:dollar_confederate_states_dollar_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#dollar_liberian_dollar
buy_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_liberian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = dollar_liberian_dollar_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:dollar_liberian_dollar_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:dollar_liberian_dollar_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state
							stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = dollar_liberian_dollar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
