					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state > var:eco_ghanaian_pound_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#eco_nigerian_naira
buy_eco_nigerian_naira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_nigerian_naira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_eco_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state
							stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_nigerian_naira_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_nigerian_naira_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_nigerian_naira_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state > var:eco_nigerian_naira_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_nigerian_naira_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#eco_south_african_rand
buy_eco_south_african_rand_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_south_african_rand_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_south_african_rand_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_eco_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_south_african_rand_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_eco_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:eco_south_african_rand_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state
							stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_south_african_rand_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_south_african_rand_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_south_african_rand_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_south_african_rand_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_south_african_rand_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_south_african_rand_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:eco_south_african_rand_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state > var:eco_south_african_rand_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_south_african_rand_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_south_african_rand_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#eco_tuareg_ouguiya
buy_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:eco_tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state
							stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:eco_tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state > var:eco_tuareg_ouguiya_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#eco_west_african_eco
buy_eco_west_african_eco_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_west_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
							stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_eco_west_african_eco_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_west_african_eco_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = eco_west_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_eco_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state > var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_west_african_eco_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_eco_west_african_eco_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#franc_belgian_franc
buy_franc_belgian_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_belgian_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
							stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_belgian_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_belgian_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_belgian_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_franc_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state > var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_belgian_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_belgian_franc_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#franc_french_franc
buy_franc_french_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_french_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = franc_french_franc_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
							stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_french_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_french_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_french_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = franc_french_franc_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_franc_french_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_franc_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state > var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_french_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_french_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_french_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_french_franc_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#franc_luxembourgish_franc
buy_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
							stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state > var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#franc_swiss_franc
buy_franc_swiss_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_swiss_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state
							stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_franc_swiss_franc_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_franc_swiss_franc_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = franc_swiss_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_franc_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state > var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_swiss_franc_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_franc_swiss_franc_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#gulden
buy_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:gulden_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_gulden_state
							stockpiling_gulden_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_gulden_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:gulden_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_gulden_state > var:gulden_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_gulden_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#gulden_bavarian_gulden
buy_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:gulden_bavarian_gulden_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
							stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
