					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_ruble_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_ruble_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:spe_ruble_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_spe_ruble_state > var:spe_ruble_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_ruble_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_ruble_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#spe_uni
buy_spe_uni_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = spe_uni_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_spe_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_uni_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_spe_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:spe_uni_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_uni_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_spe_uni_state
							stockpiling_spe_uni_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_uni_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_uni_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_uni_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = spe_uni_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_uni_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_spe_uni_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_uni_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_uni_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:spe_uni_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_spe_uni_state > var:spe_uni_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_uni_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_uni_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_uni_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_uni_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#spe_yen
buy_spe_yen_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = spe_yen_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_yen_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:spe_yen_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yen_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_spe_yen_state
							stockpiling_spe_yen_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yen_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yen_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_yen_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = spe_yen_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yen_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_spe_yen_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_yen_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_yen_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:spe_yen_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_spe_yen_state > var:spe_yen_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yen_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yen_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yen_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yen_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#spe_yuan
buy_spe_yuan_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = spe_yuan_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_yuan_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:spe_yuan_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_spe_yuan_state
							stockpiling_spe_yuan_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yuan_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_yuan_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_yuan_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = spe_yuan_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0

					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_yuan_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_yuan_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:spe_yuan_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_spe_yuan_state > var:spe_yuan_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yuan_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_yuan_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#spe_zloti
buy_spe_zloti_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = spe_zloti_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_zloti_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_spe_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_zloti_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_spe_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:spe_zloti_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_spe_zloti_state
							stockpiling_spe_zloti_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_zloti_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_spe_zloti_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_zloti_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = spe_zloti_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = spe_zloti_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:spe_zloti_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_spe_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:spe_zloti_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_spe_zloti_state > var:spe_zloti_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_zloti_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_spe_zloti_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
buy_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state
							stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state > var:thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#thaler_prussian_thaler
buy_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = thaler_prussian_thaler_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state
							stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = thaler_prussian_thaler_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée

					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0

					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state > var:thaler_prussian_thaler_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#thaler_saxon_thaler
buy_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = buyer
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = thaler_saxon_thaler_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner  #liste possede un élement 
			scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency  #vérifit la loi du pays cible 
				money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #la monaie sous evalué à plus de 10% de la money_value
				infamy < infamy_threshold:pariah #la monaie sous evalué n'est pas acheter si le pays est un pariah
				not = {  #pas d'achat si sujet, a le modifier d'echnge monetaire, a la loi isolationniste
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
			}
		}

		scope:buyer = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency  #pas d'achat d'une devise identique 
							is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
					value = 10000000
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
					value = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
						scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
							#scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity < stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
							stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state > 10000000
							money_value < money_value_target_real_below_10 #money_value_target_real
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buyer_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
									subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_buyer_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency = {
	root = {
		save_scope_as = seller
	}

	random_in_global_list = {
		variable = thaler_saxon_thaler_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
		save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner #liste possede un élement 
			scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency 
				not = {
					or = {
						is_subject = yes
						has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
						has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					}
				}
				#2 possibilité:
				OR = {
					money_value > money_value_target_real_above_10 #- soit la valeur doit etre equilibré car le pays qui rachete sa devise est sur-évaluée
					scope:seller.trade_balance_in_currency < 0 #- soit le pays vendeur à un deficite à comblé est a besoins d'or donc il vent sont exédent
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0
					scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
					infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah #test

					#infamy_threshold:pariah #si l'infamie est superieur à x alors la monaie du pays est vendue
				}
			}
		}

		scope:seller = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					not  = {
						or = {
							has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
							#is_subject = yes
							has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
						}
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
					value = {
						value = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
						multiply = currency_quantity_sell
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
					value = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						#123 stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state > var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit 
								scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold < central_bank_gold_reserves_state
							}
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah  # si le pays est pariah ou plus alors vend
							trade_balance_in_currency < 0 
							central_bank_gold_reserves_state < 0 
							scope:seller.central_bank_gold_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75  # si la reserve d'or pour assurer 75% de la valeur monetaire n'est pas respecter alors vent 
						}
					}
					every_scope_state = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
								is_capital = yes
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
								add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
							}
							#########

							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
							}
						}
					}
					scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
						every_scope_state = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
									is_capital = yes
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = central_bank_gold_reserves_state_1
									subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1_buy_in_gold
								}
								#########

								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
									add = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
								}
							}
						}
						#retrait du déficite du pays racheteur de sa devise
						change_variable = {
							name = import_value_in_currency
							subtract = scope:seller.var:stockpiling_overrated_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_buy_vriablity
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								import_value_in_currency < 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								name = import_value_in_currency
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#  ██████╗ ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██████╗     ███████╗ ██████╗ ████████╗     █████╗ ██╗     ██╗
# ██╔════╝ ██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗    ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗╚══██╔══╝    ██╔══██╗██║     ██║
# ██║  ███╗██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝███████║██║         ██║   ██║███████║██████╔╝    █████╗  ██║   ██║   ██║       ███████║██║     ██║
# ██║   ██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║         ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██╔══██╗    ██╔══╝  ██║   ██║   ██║       ██╔══██║██║     ██║
# ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗     ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║██║  ██║    ██║     ╚██████╔╝   ██║       ██║  ██║███████╗███████╗
#  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝      ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝    ╚═╝      ╚═════╝    ╚═╝       ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝
#
#  ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║

#begin_tag_5
	#dinar
	money_value_dinar_global_var = {
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_dinar_global_var
			value = {
				value = 0
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = dinar_reference
					}
					add = money_value_target_real
				}
			}
		}
	}

			value = {
				value = 0

# ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗███████╗     ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝    ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ██████╔╝█████╗  █████╗  █████╗  ██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║     █████╗      ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║     ██╔══╝      ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ██║  ██║███████╗██║     ███████╗██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗███████╗    ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝╚══════╝     ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝
#
# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗

# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗

			value = 1
		}

global_monetary_reference_2 = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = global_monetary_reference_money_value
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
				}
				add = money_value
			}
		}
	}
}

# #  ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██████╗         ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ██╗   ██╗███████╗███████╗        ██╗██████╗
# # ██╔════╝ ██╔═══██╗██║     ██╔══██╗        ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝       ███║██╔══██╗
# # ██║  ███╗██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██████╔╝█████╗  ███████╗█████╗  ██████╔╝██║   ██║█████╗  ███████╗       ╚██║██████╔╝
# # ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ╚════██║        ██║██╔══██╗
# # ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝███████╗██║  ██║███████╗███████║███████╗██║  ██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗███████║███████╗██║██████╔╝
# #  ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝╚═════╝

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

#

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

investement_pool_borrowing = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_ai = yes
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent >= 0.70
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value =  0.1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.70
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.65
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value =  0.080
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.65
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.60
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.060
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.60
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.55
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.040
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.55
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.40
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.020
			}
		}

		###################
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.40
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.30

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.01
			}
		}
		###################


		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.30
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.25

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.0080
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.25
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.20

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.0060
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.20
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.15

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.0040
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.15
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.10

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.0020
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.10

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.0010
			}

			#transfer direct
			set_variable = {
				name = direct_transfer
				value = money_supply_state_25
			}
		}
		###################
	}

	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_capital
		}
	}

	# 				name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#thaler_prussian_thaler
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
	# 		}
	# 		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {
	# 			change_variable = {
	# 				name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
	# 				subtract = owner.private_bank_borrowings_year
	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	#thaler_saxon_thaler
	# 	else_if = {
	# 		limit = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
	# 		}

	# 			}
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# }
	add_investment_pool = {
		add = private_bank_borrowings_year
	}
}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

#Bc production methode

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

central_bank_production_methods = {
	every_scope_state = {
		#pm_bond_production
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner  = {
					national_debt_compared_gdp >= 0.05
				}
				is_production_method_active = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_no_bond_production
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_bond_production
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner  = {
					national_debt_compared_gdp < 0.05
				}
				is_production_method_active = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_bond_production
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_bond_production
			}
		}
		#pm_gold_consuption and subject currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_production_method_active = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_no_gold_standard_bank_money_currency
				}
				or = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_paper_gold_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_gold_consuption
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						central_bank_gold_reserves_market_goods_sell_orders = 0
						country_rank < rank_value:great_power
						is_not_market_owner = yes
					}
					is_subject_custom_trigger = no
				}
				or = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_gold_consuption
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_no_gold_standard_bank_money_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_paper_gold_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						central_bank_gold_reserves_market_goods_sell_orders > 0
						country_rank = rank_value:great_power
					}
					is_subject_custom_trigger = no
					is_not_market_owner = no
				}
				or = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_paper_gold_consuption
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_no_gold_standard_bank_money_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_gold_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}		
	}
}

central_bank_production_methods_2 = {
	every_scope_state = {
		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_overlord_or_above = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_overlord_or_above = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_overlord_or_above = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
					}

						has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			}

				production_method = pm_subject_currency_peso_argentine_peso_currency

						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_yen_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_yen_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#spe_yuan
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_overlord_or_above = {
						has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_yuan_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_yuan_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#spe_zloti
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_overlord_or_above = {
						has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_zloti_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_spe_zloti_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_overlord_or_above = {
						has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#thaler_prussian_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_overlord_or_above = {
						has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#thaler_saxon_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_overlord_or_above = {
						has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}












	}
}

#Bc production methode

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

remove_law_currency = {
	activate_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
}

regulation_law_gold_standard = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_no_standard
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_technology_researched = currency_standards
			or = {
				has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
				not = {
					or = {
						has_technology_researched = gold_standard
						has_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_currency_standard
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_technology_researched = gold_standard
			not = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					has_technology_researched = gold_exchange_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
				}
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_technology_researched = gold_exchange_standard
			not = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
					has_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
				}
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard
	}
}
